quote: You don't learn by doing something right. All that you do when you can do something right is confirm that you already know how to do it.
why_clipworthy: This challenges the conventional fear of failure and encourages a growth mindset.
suggested_hook: Why failing might be the best thing for your success.

quote: Fortunes are made in down economies. Everything can be leveraged to your benefit and your betterment.
why_clipworthy: This offers a positive perspective on challenging market conditions.
suggested_hook: Why a down market might be your biggest opportunity yet.
